attributes.action: stop the closures of remploy factories.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: can you help you might have heard the news on 22/5/07 remploy are proposing to close 43 factories.please sign our petition to prevent theses closures

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop the closures of remploy factories."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12968.asp

Prime Minister's Office
